column2: ALPHA TO BRAVO. PACKAGE IS SECURED. EXTRACT EXTRACT EXTRACT. OVER.
ALPHA TO BRAVO. MISSION FAILED, PACKAGE IS DEAD. GET US OUTTA HERE. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. CONVOY INTERDICTED. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR FAST ROPING. OVER.
GOOD LUCK ALPHA. CALL US WHEN YOURE READY. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME BACK. HOPE YOU GOT NICE PRESENT FOR US. OVER.
Getting ready for another daring mission...
